metadata.description: Usage and installation for create-8004-agent: how to create ERC-8004/8004 AI agents, wizard options, supported chains (EVM and Solana), and post-generation steps (configure, register, start A2A/MCP). Optional script to switch generated project to Anthropic Claude.

plugins.name: erc8004-agent-creator
plugins.description: Usage and installation for create-8004-agent (ERC-8004 / 8004 scaffold). Use when the user asks how to create an ERC-8004 or 8004 agent, how to install or run create-8004-agent, wizard options, chains, or how to configure and register the generated project.
